headline: Southwest is offering buyouts to airport workers and blaming Boeing for the job cuts
summary: The move on Monday comes as a hedge fund presses Southwest to increase profits and boost the stock price, which has fallen sharply since early 2021.  A Southwest spokesperson said the offers of “voluntary separation” are limited to 18 airports.
